channel.title: SoundCloud shows private track was played?
channel.description:
![image|318x500](upload://tsgUvwVXR0ODuAGTNoF6lYmFiw3.jpeg)
So. The bizarre thing here is that Panopticon Flow is currently private, yet it was played. Has anyone else experienced this?

item.title: SoundCloud shows private track was played?
item.dc:creator: AnirudhKhanna
item.description:
Or maybe your phone is haunted and you should throw that one out and get a new one.

Jimmy the ghost is dAnGeRoUs

Read full topic
item.source: SoundCloud shows private track was played?

item.title: SoundCloud shows private track was played?
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Ahhhh and the permissions were allowing that, so maybe maybe, that makes sense. It’s all good will go back to normal this Friday anyway, just thought it was weird

Read full topic
item.source: SoundCloud shows private track was played?

item.title: SoundCloud shows private track was played?
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Wondering if it might be someone who has SoundCloud Go/Go+, which allows for downloading for offline listening. Possible someone grabbed it for offline listening when it was public, played it today and it still registers as a new play.

Read full topic
item.source: SoundCloud shows private track was played?

item.title: SoundCloud shows private track was played?
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
I’m always logged in though, I don’t think those plays count. I didn’t anyway though… very bizarre. It’s not a huge deal, it’s just weird haha

item.title: SoundCloud shows private track was played?
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
They were public yeah… I’ve set to private because I replaced all the audio files with re-mixed (not REMIXED, but just more carefully mixed) and finalized versions. I don’t think I’ve ever shared the private link with anyone
